1: <pb/><t>Nimu' wajq'oje, Nman Dyos,</t> <t>nimqe' matxi' che b'jo'k miltz'uj wi'je',</t>
2: <t>¡nim xjal inq'mante wi'je':</t> <t>Mixti'tlte' kolb'ilte tu'n Dyos! chechij.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Atzunta Taye,</t> <t>aya klol weye' b'a'nxi'x,</t> <t>nim woklene' tu'na,</t> <t>aya in kuwsante wanmiye'.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Njaw tq'ojq'ojel nwi'ye' tu'n nqanin o'nb'ile' te Qman Dyos</t> <t>ex nchin tzaj ttzaq'we'ne' tzmajx twi' witz xjan.</t>
5: <t>Ajnkub' kẍeye' ex ajwik'wtane', ex ajttzaj nna'n wib'e',</t> <t>ate Qman Dyos xq'uqilweye'.</t>
6: <t>Min nchin xob'e' kyeju' tnam xjal</t> <t>txoli'nkyib' wi'je' tu'n kyok tzaqpaj wi'je'.</t>
7: <pb/><t>¡Iq'i'nktz tib'a Taye!</t> <t>¡Chin tkloma, Nman Dyos!</t> <t>Poq'ima kywitzju' wajq'oje;</t> <t>¡q'uchimitza kywitzte b'inchal myab'a'n!</t>
8: <t>Aya Nman Dyos inkolon;</t> <t>¡ky'iwlanku'ya ttanama! chiju' b'itzal.</t>
